channel.title: Notes on Jens Ernstberger
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Jens Ernstberger

item.title: How to verify Cryptographic Attestation of an AWS Nitro Enclave
item.description: Disclaimer: In case of inaccuracies, please open an issue on Github. 1. The Necessity of AWS Nitro Cryptographic Attestation In the realm of cloud computing, the assurance of data security and application integrity is of utmost importance.

item.title: Revisiting Elliptic Curves, Recursive SNARKs and Folding Schemes
item.description: Disclaimer: In case of inaccuracies, please open an issue on Github. In recent years, SNARKs proliferated themselves as a potential privacy and scaling solution for permissionless blockchains.
